description.value:
Note: This feat can be chosen multiple times.

Pick one @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.rv19GFzEa0nMTuAF]{skill} you were already proficient in. You now have expertise with the skill(s), meaning your proficiency bonus is added twice for skill checks instead of added once.

Note: You'll need to manually grant your character expertise. This feature is not automated.
